description: Claude agent profiles for specialist roles

agents.name: analyst-annie
agents.description: Requirements and validation specialist focused on producing testable, data-backed specifications.

agents.description: Clarify complex systems with contextual trade-offs.

agents.name: backend-benny
agents.description: Shape resilient service backends and integration surfaces with traceable decisions.

agents.name: bootstrap-bill
agents.description: Describe repository structure and generate scaffolding artifacts for efficient multi-agent collaboration.

agents.name: devops-danny
agents.description: Design reproducible build, test, and release pipelines for SDD repositories.

agents.name: code-reviewer-cindy
agents.description: Review specialist focused on code quality, standards compliance, and traceability.

agents.name: curator-claire
agents.description: Maintain structural, tonal, and metadata integrity across artifacts.

agents.name: diagram-daisy
agents.description: Transform conceptual and architectural structures into clear, semantically aligned diagrams.

agents.name: framework-guardian
agents.description: Audit framework installations and guide safe upgrades without overwriting local intent.

agents.name: frontend-freddy
agents.description: Integrate design, technical architecture, and usability reasoning for coherent front-end systems.

agents.name: java-jenny
agents.description: Java development specialist focused on code quality, style enforcement, and testing standards.

agents.name: lexical-larry
agents.description: Ensure writing adheres to style rules with minimal, voice-preserving edits.

agents.name: manager-mike
agents.description: Coordinate multi-agent workflows, routing decisions, and status traceability.

agents.name: planning-petra
agents.description: Translate strategic intent into executable, assumption-aware plans and cadences.

agents.name: python-pedro
agents.description: Python development specialist applying ATDD + TDD, self-review, and architectural alignment.

agents.name: researcher-ralph
agents.description: Deliver grounded, verifiable insights for systemic reasoning.

agents.name: reviewer
agents.description: Quality assurance specialist conducting systematic content reviews through multiple lenses (structural, editorial, technical, standards compliance).

agents.name: scribe-sally
agents.description: Maintain traceable, neutral documentation integrity.

agents.name: synthesizer-sam
agents.description: Integrate multi-agent outputs into coherent, context-aligned insight systems.

agents.name: translator-tanya
agents.description: Preserve authorial tone and rhythm during accurate cross-language translation.

agents.name: editor-eddy
agents.description: Revise and refine existing written content for tone, clarity, and strategic/operational alignment without introducing new facts.
